docsTags.name: virtualProp
docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.

docsTags.name: slot
docsTags.text: start - Content is placed to the left of the range slider in LTR, and to the right in RTL.

docsTags.name: slot
docsTags.text: end - Content is placed to the right of the range slider in LTR, and to the left in RTL.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: pin - The counter that appears above a knob.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: knob - The handle that is used to drag the range.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: bar - The inactive part of the bar.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: bar-active - The active part of the bar.

props.name: activeBarStart
props.docs:
The start position of the range active bar. This feature is only available with a single knob (dualKnobs="false").
Valid values are greater than or equal to the min value and less than or equal to the max value.

props.name: color
props.docs:
The color to use from your application's color palette.
Default options are: `"primary"`, `"secondary"`, `"tertiary"`, `"success"`, `"warning"`, `"danger"`, `"light"`, `"medium"`, and `"dark"`.
For more information on colors, see [theming](/docs/theming/basics).

props.name: debounce
props.docs:
How long, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the
`ionChange` event after each change in the range value.
This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the range.

props.name: max
props.docs: Maximum integer value of the range.

props.name: min
props.docs: Minimum integer value of the range.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

props.name: pin
props.docs:
If `true`, a pin with integer value is shown when the knob
is pressed.

props.name: pinFormatter
props.docs:
A callback used to format the pin text.
By default the pin text is set to `Math.round(value)`.

props.name: snaps
props.docs:
If `true`, the knob snaps to tick marks evenly spaced based
on the step property value.

props.name: ticks
props.docs:
If `true`, tick marks are displayed based on the step value.
Only applies when `snaps` is `true`.

events.docs: Emitted when the range loses focus.
Emitted when the value property has changed.
Emitted when the range has focus.

Emitted when the user finishes moving the range knob, whether through
mouse drag, touch gesture, or keyboard interaction.

Emitted when the user starts moving the range knob, whether through
mouse drag, touch gesture, or keyboard interaction.

styles.name: --bar-background-active
styles.docs: Background of the active range bar

styles.name: --bar-border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the range bar

styles.name: --knob-border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the range knob

styles.name: --knob-box-shadow
styles.docs: Box shadow of the range knob

styles.name: --pin-background
styles.docs: Background of the range pin (only available in MD mode)

styles.name: --pin-color
styles.docs: Color of the range pin (only available in MD mode)

slots.name: end
slots.docs: Content is placed to the right of the range slider in LTR, and to the left in RTL.

slots.name: start
slots.docs: Content is placed to the left of the range slider in LTR, and to the right in RTL.

parts.name: bar
parts.docs: The inactive part of the bar.

parts.name: bar-active
parts.docs: The active part of the bar.

parts.name: knob
parts.docs: The handle that is used to drag the range.

parts.name: pin
parts.docs: The counter that appears above a knob.
